name: Head Charge
description: You lower your head and charge at a creature. Make a melee attack. On a hit, you deal 2d10 + MOVE normal damage, taking a quarter of the total damage (rounded down) in typeless recoil.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: A very appealing move, but after using this move, the user is more easily startled.
